meta.title: Contract #023: The Frame
meta.description: IDENTITY THEFT: 7 Nodes, 2 Fakes. Physical evidence conflicts with digital reality.
meta.journal: The physical evidence was planted to match a stolen identity. The Metro Pass log initially looked damning, but the system update revealed the card ID didn't match the database hash. It was a clone.

nodes.text: --:-- - Metro Pass: 'Subject A' Swipes in at Station North.

morph.text: --:-- - Metro Pass: 'Card ID Mismatch / Clone Detected'.

nodes.text: --:-- - CCTV: Person in hoodie exits Station North.
--:-- - Crime Scene: Fingerprint found on weapon (Subject A).
--:-- - Digital Shadow: Subject A Phone Ping (Station South).
--:-- - Witness: 'I saw Subject A's face clearly.'
--:-- - ATM Camera: Subject A withdrawing cash (Station South).
--:-- - Police Blotter: Suspect detained at Station South.
